name: Fundamental Constants from Algebraic Principles
key_discovery: Division algebras (R, C, H, O) may determine ALL fundamental constants of physics

spectral_action_framework.name: Connes-Chamseddine Spectral Action

newton_G.term: Lambda^2 * f_2 * a_2 gives Einstein-Hilbert action
newton_G.status: Appears but cutoff scale not yet derived

cosmological_lambda.status: Appears but huge value requires cancellation mechanism

higgs_mass.status: Predicted ~170 GeV, measured 125 GeV - needs modification

spectral_action_framework.key_insight: G, Lambda, gauge couplings, Higgs mass ALL emerge from ONE algebraic structure

singh_octonionic.author: Tejinder P. Singh
singh_octonionic.approach: 8-dimensional octonionic spacetime with exceptional Jordan algebra

fine_structure_from_octonions.significance: PARADIGM-SHIFTING - alpha was considered a free parameter

atiyah_dictionary.implication: If true, ALL physics from division algebra structure

Q54_newton_G.answer: G appears via cutoff scale in spectral action: G ~ 1/Lambda^2
Q54_newton_G.remaining: What determines the cutoff scale algebraically?

Q55_cosmological_lambda.answer: Lambda appears as Lambda^4 term in spectral action
Q55_cosmological_lambda.remaining: Why is Lambda ~ 10^{-122}? Cancellation mechanism unknown

Q59_all_constants.answer: Strong evidence that ALL constants derive from division algebras
evidence: Standard Model gauge structure from octonions
Spectral action unifies G, Lambda, gauge, Higgs

new_questions.question: Do ALL fundamental constants derive from division algebra structure?
Why dimensions 1, 2, 4, 8 for division algebras? Connection to spacetime?
Is cosmological constant problem solved by octonions?
Does exceptional Jordan algebra give complete theory?
Connection between octonions (8D) and string theory (10/11D)?
Can we derive particle MASSES from algebra?
Is hierarchy problem (Higgs << Planck) resolved algebraically?
What determines the CUTOFF SCALE in spectral action?

implications.title: Physics May Be Unique
implications.content: If all constants from division algebras, and only 4 division algebras exist (Hurwitz theorem), then only ONE possible physics. No multiverse needed.

implications.title: Fine-Tuning Problem Dissolves
implications.content: Constants aren't 'fine-tuned' - they're mathematically determined. Life is not coincidence.

implications.title: Theory of Everything = Division Algebras
implications.content: The 'Theory of Everything' may be the theory of how R, C, H, O generate physics.

implications.title: Quantum Gravity via Octonions
implications.content: If gravity from octonions, then quantum gravity = understanding octonionic algebra, not quantizing spacetime.

the_hierarchy.level_0: Division algebras R, C, H, O (unique by Hurwitz theorem)
the_hierarchy.level_1: Algebraic structure: Non-commutativity -> Time, Tensor -> Space, Modular -> Causality
the_hierarchy.level_4: Standard Model + Gravity (via Connes spectral action)
the_hierarchy.level_5: ALL fundamental constants (G, Lambda, alpha, masses)

confidence_level: HIGH for alpha derivation; EMERGING for complete unification
